ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Excuse me, Logo, but what are the new things the Alliance made? Beholder had some pretty up to date stuff, I want to know what Squizzy is giving him

OOC: Excuse me, Logo, but what are the new things the Alliance made?
Beholder had some pretty up to date stuff, I want to know what Squizzy is
giving him please...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2000 9:11 AM
Subject: Allience


> Squizzy::
>
> She worked feverously over the Beholder clone. The CR tank was
> regenerating the body nicely. It was already 25% complete. She had
> all the DNA scanned into the computer and let the tank do the rest.
> She had to make a few modifications on the weapons and scanners. The
> ones on the old bot were out of date and she simply upgraded the bot
> to modern standards.
>
> While the Beholder clone was in the tank, she went to work on the
> Feline clone. She had to reassemble it somewhat and check the back up
> memory diskes. Both bots had thier old memories intact and she could
> download them into the clones once they were complete. This would
> give the clones thier old personality and habits. They would also
> recognize thier old comrads and such. This would make things easier
> instead of programing them as new bots entirely.
>
> She finished with Feline's DNA and hooked up another CR tank. She
> then ran the programs and started to generate the Feline clone.
> She smiled and felt rather sure of her work. She had cloned bots
> before, but from living specimens, not the remains of a bot. But it
> still involved the same stuff, so she felt confident that her work
> would turn out just right.
>
>
>
>
>
